verbose_text: In the present study, the following results were observed : i) CRA inhibited cardiac fibrosis and improved left ventricular dysfunction following MI; ii) CRA reduced the production of ROS, which was associated with regulating the activity of the AMPKalpha/Nrf2/HO-1 signalling pathway and Noxs, particularly Nox2 and Nox4; iii) CRA inhibited inflammation and apoptosis caused by MI; and iv) AMPKalpha inhibition reversed the protective effect of CRA.
